VersionInfo.Title: West Wind WebSurge Version 0.86b is now available
VersionInfo.Detail: This update adds support for Plugins to act on beginning and end of tests and individual requests. Recent versions added better HTTP result viewing support with formatted syntax highlighting, raw and preview modes. There's now support for authentication for all or individual requests. You can now also quickly activate/deactivate requests in a test session and run all tests once and review results.
